name: Hold My Beer
description: This is a ridiculous game where you play the role of an idiot, doing idiotic dares and stunts. I don't recommend trying this at home, but since we'll be doing it in virtual reality, go right ahead!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or better Storage: 700 MB available space
